desc: Positive Protection has formulated a moisturising Anti-Bacterial Hand Sanitising Gel in a pump bottle with essential oils and 70% Alcohol to kill germs you may be exposed to and to protect you from harmful bacteria. We have included Eucalyptus oil and Lavender oil to assist in giving your hands a moisturising feel and

layout.text: Moisturising Anti-Bacterial Hand Sanitisers and Surface Spray.
